comment.author: 92712677@N07
comment._content:
Adelaide was settled in Dec 1836 when the 'Buffalo' arrived with the first settlers. The foundation stone of Holy Trinity Church was laid in 1837 and subsequently built

So dates on many of these photos are incorrect.
Pamela in Adeaide

comment.author: 31575009@N05
comment._content: Thank you for your feedback. I have checked the date printed on the original document and it should have read 1849. I have corrected the description for this image and the rest in this set.
